patthana17.31:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.31:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.31:3.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
